de.awi.floenavigation.grid

Class GridActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • de.awi.floenavigation.grid.GridActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public class GridActivity
extends android.app.Activity
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener
    GridActivity class takes care of creating and initializing async tasks to read {x,y} values from all the database tables of interest. Separate AsyncTask tasks are created to handle each database table. It runs on a background thread. It periodically runs at a rate of 8000. The values extracted from the database tables are stored in the corresponding HashMap which are send to MapView using setters. It also takes care of handling of status bar icons and tablet location updates.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void actionBarUpdatesFunction()
      Handles the registration of broadcast receiver and implementation of onReceive function of the gps broadcast receiver Whenever an updated location it available from the GPS_Service, the onReceive function gets triggered and the new coordinates are stored in these 2 variables tabletLat and tabletLon.
      private void calculateTabletGridCoordinates()
      This function handles the functionality of receiving the tablet coordinates and translating it to (x, y) coordinates.

      Intializes the location service and obtains the last known location of the tablet

      On pressing on the focus button, the grid size gets changed

      void onDestroy()
      onDestroy handles the cancelling of the asyncTaskTimer timer and refresh timer of the map view
      boolean onOptionsItemSelected(android.view.MenuItem item)
      This function is called whenever an item in the option menu is selected Whenever the item is selected, the ticks on the checkboxes are toggled This will result in displaying only the items selected on the grid For example, if fixed station is selected, only fixed stations will be available on the grid These selections are not available for tablet position and the position of the mothership It will be present on the grid by default all the time

      • calculateTabletGridCoordinates

        private void calculateTabletGridCoordinates()
        This function handles the functionality of receiving the tablet coordinates and translating it to (x, y) coordinates. If the tablet positions are not available from the GPS_Service, the last known positions are calculated and stored in the variables tabletLat and tabletLon The calculated parameters are then send to the MapView for displaying purpose

      • actionBarUpdatesFunction

        private void actionBarUpdatesFunction()
        Handles the registration of broadcast receiver and implementation of onReceive function of the gps broadcast receiver Whenever an updated location it available from the GPS_Service, the onReceive function gets triggered and the new coordinates are stored in these 2 variables tabletLat and tabletLon. Also, the color of the status bar icons are toggled based on the values received

      • onClickCenterButton

        public void onClickCenterButton(android.view.View view)

      • onClick

        public void onClick(android.view.View v)
        On pressing on the focus button, the grid size gets changed
        Specified by:
        onClick in interface android.view.View.OnClickListener
        Parameters:
        v - view which was clicked

      • getLastKnownLocation

        private android.location.Location getLastKnownLocation()
        Intializes the location service and obtains the last known location of the tablet
        Returns:
        the last location
